rows.label: qev070103_MSG0016
rows.name:
Hey, do you know the xeno living at the edge of the
industrial district? The one calling himself Professor B?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070103_MSG0017
rows.name: What do you make of him?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070103_MSG0018
rows.name:
Don't get me wrong, he's good business for me.
Always comes in buying parts...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070103_MSG0019
rows.name:
But I have no idea what it is he's building,
and sometimes the things he says make no sense.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070103_MSG0020
rows.name:
A little mystery is well and good, but this borders on
unsettling. I mean, when did he even come to New LA?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070103_MSG0001
rows.name:
If it's secondhand goods at ridiculous prices you're
after, Graham's your man. I'll give you deals the retail
guys wouldn't dream of![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070103_MSG0002
rows.name:
...Hmm? Professor B sent you? Ah, nice!
He's one of my best customers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070103_MSG0003
rows.name:
Car-wise, I've got a few options lined up for you.
On the left there, you've got a blue standard model.
Middle one's a junker, and then we got my red beauty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070103_MSG0004
rows.name:
What's your pleasure? Whichever you like,
I'll knock a chunk off the price for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070103_JNK0010
rows.name: Choose Average

rows.label: qev070103_SEL0011
rows.name: Purchase the blue standard model.

rows.label: qev070103_JNK0020
rows.name: Choose Junker

rows.label: qev070103_SEL0021
rows.name: Purchase the cheap jalopy.

rows.label: qev070103_JNK0030
rows.name: Choose Luxury

rows.label: qev070103_SEL0031
rows.name: Purchase the fancy red car.

rows.label: qev070103_MSG0005
rows.name:
Makes sense. It's really the perfect compromise.
I can let this baby go for 10,000 credits. Sound good?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070103_JNK0040
rows.name: Purchase

rows.label: qev070103_SEL0041
rows.name: Buy the standard car for 10,000 credits.

rows.label: qev070103_JNK0070
rows.name: Wait

rows.label: qev070103_SEL0071
rows.name: Hold off on your purchase for now.

rows.label: qev070103_MSG0007
rows.name:
Really? That bucket of bolts? I've been trying to move
that thing off the lot for mont... Uh, I mean, what a
fine purchase! Just 1,000 credits and she's all yours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070103_JNK0050
rows.name: Purchase

rows.label: qev070103_SEL0051
rows.name: Buy the old clunker for 1,000 credits.

rows.label: qev070103_MSG0009
rows.name:
You have a good eye, buddy! Top of the line taste!
This baby's the sweetest ride on Mira or anywhere else.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070103_MSG0010
rows.name:
Probably the most expensive, too. But you tell me,
is there a better use for 100,000 credits? Ha!
...The answer is no, by the way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070103_JNK0060
rows.name: Purchase

rows.label: qev070103_SEL0061
rows.name: Buy the luxury car for 100,000 credits.

rows.label: qev070103_MSG0011
rows.name:
Thanks much! I'll deliver it to Professor B's place for
you, free of charge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070103_MSG0014
rows.name:
Gonna think on it awhile? Well, I'll be here.
Once you make up your mind, just let me know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070103_MSG0015
rows.name:
...Hmm? Doesn't look like you've got enough, friend.
Sorry, but I'm going to need cash on the barrelhead
for this one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070103_MSG0012
rows.name:
Heh. I was glad to see Professor B liked the car you
picked up for him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070103_MSG0013
rows.name:
In the end, you get what you pay for, right?
...I wouldn't drive it anywhere it would stand out,
but maybe that's just me.[ST:wait ]
